allow: Bash(for file in admin/clients/[id]/points/route.ts admin/clients/[id]/pricing/route.ts admin/clients/[id]/reset-password/route.ts admin/clients/[id]/route.ts admin/submissions/[id]/route.ts as-requests/[id]/route.ts)
Bash(__NEW_LINE__ sed -i '/await requireAuth/a\    const { id } = await params;' admin/clients/[id]/pricing/route.ts)
Bash(__NEW_LINE__ sed -i '/await requireAuth/a\    const { id } = await params;' admin/clients/[id]/reset-password/route.ts)
Bash(__NEW_LINE__ sed -i '/await requireAuth/a\    const { id } = await params;' admin/clients/[id]/route.ts)
Bash(__NEW_LINE__ sed -i '/await requireAuth/a\    const { id } = await params;' admin/submissions/[id]/route.ts)
Bash(__NEW_LINE__ sed -i '/await requireAuth/a\    const { id } = await params;' as-requests/[id]/route.ts)

Bash(find . -name "route.ts" -type f -exec sh -c '
  if head -20 ""$1"" | grep -q ""^\*/$""; then
    echo ""Disabling: $1""
    mv ""$1"" ""$1.disabled""
  fi
' sh {} ;)
